changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Controller Completato, inseriti metodi di update di alcuni parametri che mancavano e molta altra roba

task.summary: Doppia reference per tutti + fix ai test per farli funzionare
CLI island and islands by vento and valentino
Add footprints of the all classes of Gui and add the intro and lobby functionality
Changes in Gui (insert new beginning description)
Add an abstract class controller for GUI
Changes to client and such by valentino and vento
CLI almost ended, still need to add winner condition valentino and vento
A big change in all GUI functionalities
Changes in wizardChoice (A little step fro human, a big step for eriantys)
All ok in all the actual views
Update in wizard opacity function and other changes in client gui ecc...
Replaced creation of Charcater cards in Character Deck with a factory method
Corrected a stupid mistake in char deck constructor, now everything works
Found the only active Print instruction in the test classes, removed it
Made Checks "static" and changed the method calls accordingly

Removed the planning and action counters in GameHandler. Introduced a "moves" counter in CurrentTurnState, with methods to increment and reset said counter. Increments and resets called in proper functions of ActionController and PlanningController. Introduced a new "static" Checks class (MovesChecks) to help the GameHandler understand if the client is making the move we are expecting him to make.
Added hierarchy to the MainBoard setup method's
Modified pixel of students in the entrance
AssistantController done and updated the Assistants fxml
Platform run laters for Update functions
Server side teamChoice. CLI e GUI ready for change
